p: According to the specific organization, the role of the CAR-T specialist could be managed by the Transplant Program Quality Manager. The role and responsibilities of the CAR-T specialist will vary for the two models: in the first model, the CAR-T specialist will manage all the activities of the team(s), while in the second model each facility will have a CAR-T specialist (one for the oncology clinical unit, one for the hematology unit, and one for the processing and collection unity). A plan of coordination and collaboration between these CAR-T specialists will be required.
